Method.name: Sample
Method.Implementation: Set ..Adapter.WebServiceClientClass = "EnsTrain.Proxy.FromInfoWSSoap" Set tSC = ..Adapter.InvokeMethod("Sample",.SampleResult,pRequest.name) Quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) tSC Set tSC = pRequest.NewResponse(.pResponse) Quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) tSC Set pResponse.SampleResult=$get(SampleResult) Quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetPersonByName

XData.name: BPL

Method.name: Sample
OnProcessInput
Method.Implementation: set req=##class(EnsTrain.Msg.reqPersonByName).%New() set req.Name=pInput.Get("Name") set sc=..SendRequestSync("PersonProcess",req,.pOutput) quit sc

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='EnsTrain.Msg.respPerson' targetClass='EnsLib.HL7.Message' targetDocType='2.3.1:ADT_A01' create='new' language='objectscript' > <assign value='source.Name' property='target.{PID:PatientName(1)}' action='set' /> <assign value='$zd(source.DOB,3)' property='target.{PID:DateTimeOfBirth}' action='set' /> <assign value='source.SSN' property='target.{PID:SSNNumberPatient}' action='set' /> <assign value='"1200131"' property='target.{PID:3(1).1}' action='set' /> <assign value='source.Tag' property='target.{PID:PatientAlias(1)}' action='set' /> <assign value='$zd($h,3)' property='target.{EVN:RecordedDateTime}' action='set' /> <assign value='"^~\&"' property='target.{MSH:EncodingCharacters}' action='set' /> <assign value='"ADT"' property='target.{MSH:MessageType.messagetype}' action='set' /> <assign value='"A01"' property='target.{MSH:MessageType.triggerevent}' action='set' /> <assign value='source.SSN' property='target.{MSH:MessageControlID}' action='set' /> <assign value='"P"' property='target.{MSH:ProcessingID}' action='set' /> <assign value='"2.3.1"' property='target.{MSH:VersionID.versionID}' action='set' /> <assign value='"utf-8"' property='target.{MSH:18(1)}' action='set' /> <assign value='"I"' property='target.{PV1:PatientClass}' action='set' /> <assign value='..Lookup("PersonStateToChinese",source.State)' property='target.{PID:PatientAddress(1).stateorprovince}' action='set' /> <if condition='source.State="RI"' > <true> <assign value='"NNDF"' property='target.{PID:PatientAddress().otherdesignation}' action='set' /> <assign value='"ABC"' property='target.{PID:PatientAddress().streetaddress}' action='set' /> </true> <false> <assign value='"DDDD"' property='target.{PID:PatientAddress().city}' action='set' /> <assign value='"BCD"' property='target.{PID:PatientAddress().streetaddress}' action='set' /> </false> </if> </transform>

XData.name: DTL
XData.Data: <transform sourceClass='EnsLib.HL7.Message' targetClass='EnsLib.HL7.Message' sourceDocType='2.3.1:ADT_A01' targetDocType='2.4:ADT_A01' create='copy' language='objectscript' > <assign value='"2.4"' property='target.{MSH:VersionID.versionID}' action='set' /> </transform>

Class.name: EnsTrain.Msg.reqPersonByName
Class.Description: request person details by person name根据姓名返回详细信息

XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="EnsTrain.PersonSample" TestingEnabled="true" LogGeneralTraceEvents="true"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="ToSample" Category="" ClassName="EnsTrain.BO.ToSample" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DSN">SamplesDB</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Credentials">Sample</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="PersonProcess" Category="" ClassName="EnsTrain.BP.PersonProcess" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="HL7FileOut" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.HL7.Operation.FileOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">c:\temp</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Filename">%f_%Q%!+(_a).txt</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="RouteOutput" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.HL7.MsgRouter.RoutingEngine" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Validation"></Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="BusinessRuleName">EnsTrain.Rule.RouteOutput</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="EnsTrain.BS.FromInfoWS" Category="" ClassName="EnsTrain.BS.FromInfoWS" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="EnsTrain.BO.FromInfoWSSoap" Category="" ClassName="EnsTrain.BO.FromInfoWSSoap" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="EnsTrain.BS.FromSQL" Category="" ClassName="EnsTrain.BS.FromSQL" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Credentials">Sample</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DSN">SamplesDB</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="DeleteQuery">UPDATE Sample.Person SET Done=1 WHERE ID=?</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Query">select * from Sample.Person where Done=0</Setting> </Item> </Production>

Parameter.name: LOCATION
Parameter.Description: This is the URL used to access the web service.

Parameter.name: NAMESPACE
Parameter.Description: This is the namespace used by the Service

Parameter.name: OUTPUTTYPEATTRIBUTE
Parameter.Description: Use xsi:type attribute for literal types.

Parameter.name: SERVICENAME
Parameter.Description: This is the name of the Service

Parameter.name: SOAPVERSION
Parameter.Description: This is the SOAP version supported by the service.

XData.name: RuleDefinition
XData.Data: <ruleDefinition alias="" context="EnsTrain.BP.PersonProcess.Context" production=""> <ruleSet name="GetPersonTag" effectiveBegin="" effectiveEnd=""> <rule name="TeslaVIP" disabled="false"> <when condition="((Person.Name="Tesla,Patrick K.")||(Person.DOB="2015-08-04"))&&(Person.State="CT")"> <return>"VIP"</return> </when> </rule> <rule name="ORVIP" disabled="false"> <when condition="Person.State="OR""> <return>"VIP"</return> </when> <otherwise> <return>"Client"</return> </otherwise> </rule> </ruleSet> </ruleDefinition>

XData.name: RuleDefinition
XData.Data: <ruleDefinition alias="" context="EnsLib.HL7.MsgRouter.RoutingEngine" production="EnsTrain.PersonSample"> <ruleSet name="" effectiveBegin="" effectiveEnd=""> <rule name="" disabled="false"> <constraint name="docCategory" value="2.3.1"></constraint> <constraint name="docName" value="ADT_A01"></constraint> <when condition="HL7.{PID:PatientAddress(1).stateorprovince}="特拉华""> <send transform="EnsTrain.DT.TOHL7V27" target="HL7FileOut"></send> <return></return> </when> <otherwise> <send transform="" target="HL7FileOut"></send> <return></return> </otherwise> </rule> </ruleSet> </ruleDefinition>
